com.jess.arms.widget.boxing.tool

类 BoxingGlideLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jess.arms.widget.boxing.tool.BoxingGlideLoader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IBoxingMediaLoader

    public class BoxingGlideLoader
extends Object
implements IBoxingMediaLoader
    use https://github.com/bumptech/glide as media loader. can not be used in Production Environment.
    作者:
    ChenSL

    • 方法详细资料

      • displayThumbnail

        public void displayThumbnail(android.widget.ImageView img,
                             String absPath,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        从接口复制的说明: IBoxingMediaLoader
        display thumbnail images for a ImageView.
        指定者:
        displayThumbnail 在接口中 IBoxingMediaLoader
        参数:
        img - the display ImageView. Through ImageView.getTag(R.string.boxing_app_name) to get the absolute path of the exact path to display.
        absPath - the absolute path to display, may be out of date when fast scrolling.
        width - the resize with for the image.
        height - the resize height for the image.

      • displayRaw

        public void displayRaw(android.widget.ImageView img,
                       String absPath,
                       int width,
                       int height,
                       IBoxingCallback callback)
        从接口复制的说明: IBoxingMediaLoader
        display raw images for a ImageView, need more work to do.
        指定者:
        displayRaw 在接口中 IBoxingMediaLoader
        参数:
        img - the display ImageView.Through ImageView.getTag(R.string.boxing_app_name) to get the absolute path of the exact path to display.
        absPath - the absolute path to display, may be out of date when fast scrolling.
        width - the expected width, 0 means the raw width.
        height - the expected height, 0 means the raw height.
        callback - the callback for the load result.
